title: Favorites Bar resize
body: I would like to use MS Edge but the favorites is not nearly as user friendly as the similar feature on Firefox. I can't view what I've opened and have favorites stay open. The favorites is too wide and cuts down on viewable area of opened site. I want Favorites bar to stay on screen and be there the next time Edge is opened.

comments.body: Favourites bar was too wide in EDGE - so what have Microsoft done in the latest update? - made it even wider! I can't see an option to customise it.
